website_summaries.verdict: An adorable duo that is a fun twist on single Fingerlings and delivers interactions that youngsters enjoy.
pros: A cute combination with a mini monkey BFF
Available in several color and name combinations
Features interactions that are similar to other Fingerlings characters
cons: Removing the mini monkey from the larger monkey's tail is easy, but putting it back on can be difficult

customer_reviews.title: Cute and fun for besties. She can’t wait for school to start to show her friends her critter.
customer_reviews.text: Just gave this to my niece for her 9th birthday. She was ecstatic. So excited. I on the other hand had a bit of an issue; the Little critter that’s pictured hanging onto the tail was very difficult to attach. I couldn’t get it to work. She took it home and said she’d work on it.
customer_reviews.author: codysplace

customer_reviews.title: Adorable, hours of fun
customer_reviews.text: My niece was entertained, and mesmerized for hours, and continues to be!! She wants different animals besides a monkey, now🤣🤣🤣
customer_reviews.author: Jace

customer_reviews.title: Instructions?
customer_reviews.text: This was cute. Not what I expected from watching commercials. You basically hold it in different ways I guess and it makes different sound. The reason I say I guess because there were no instructions. You open it and that’s it. Figure it out. Still adorable though.
customer_reviews.author: Willscar Parker

customer_reviews.title: So cute
customer_reviews.text: Great fun, my nephew luvs his new lil friend! I only gave 4 stars cause it says it does 40 diff sounds or animations, I’ve only seen or heard maybe a dozen or so. It doesn’t always do what they say when you interact with it, it kinda does what it wants. But it is fun to play with and children will luv it so I would recommend it because it is so cute. Luv when it falls asleep and starts snoring!
customer_reviews.author: Eileen

customer_reviews.title: Baby doesn't do anything
customer_reviews.text: Cute. My 5 year old loves it, but disappointed that the baby doesn't do anything. It just hangs on the mama's tail. She asked for either this one or the light up unicorn, may e we should have gone with that one?
customer_reviews.author: sand yo

customer_reviews.title: affordable and adorable
customer_reviews.text: cutest toy i've ever bought. my 3 year old is amazed and so am i. great price too. you have to get one of these monkeys.
customer_reviews.author: michelle k

customer_reviews.title: Intro d
customer_reviews.text: Grandchildren love this. Encourages interactive play. Familiarization with robotics which will certainly be in their future as computers were for their parents & grandparents. Besides, it's absolutely darling with the cute little baby hanging on her tail. The amount of interaction is amazing, at least to me. I couldn't believe all it does. We're still finding new interactions after a month or more. Boys love them as well.
customer_reviews.author: Susanna  L.  Wells

customer_reviews.title: Kids don't play with them for long.
customer_reviews.text: Just another run of the mill toy that your kid will LOVE at the store, and for the first few hours, and then never play with again. They make too much noise. So in other words: they're a kid's toy in the current age. :)
customer_reviews.author: Thomas & Jessii

customer_reviews.title: You can purchase other sets and they interact
customer_reviews.text: These are cute little pets, I had to order 1 just to see why the kids are so infatuated with them
customer_reviews.author: rachel ware

customer_reviews.title: So cute and perfect gift!
customer_reviews.text: My son got this as a secret Santa present for his cousin and she loved it! She had never heard of fingerlings and he picked this with the matching bracelet with 3 mini fingerlings. After showing her what they did she fell in love with it💘 My son and I were so happy she has a new baby to take care of:) my fiance surprised me with one a few weeks later for my birthday bc I enjoyed it so much also(and I'm 35 lol)
customer_reviews.author: Miss Voodoo

customer_reviews.title: The real deal
customer_reviews.text: Wasn’t sure after reading some of the reviews but as you can see.... super cute and my daughter loves these fingerlings. We will definitely buy more! Great price, packaging, delivery was on time.
customer_reviews.author: SonyP

customer_reviews.title: Made my daughters day
customer_reviews.text: My 12 year old daughter was delighted to receive this for her birthday.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Hockenberry

customer_reviews.title: My nephew thought this was creepy.
customer_reviews.text: Super cute but weirded my nephew out. I started posing the monkey in weird places to make it even creepier. I had a lot of fun bringing it to the Xmas dinner table, had the monkey holding a Barbie head, chilling in Polly Pocket's car. 😂 I thought it was cute, but the 9 year old didn't appreciate the monkey that he kept calling "creepy." I think Elf on a Shelf is WAY creepier. 🤷🏼‍♀️ It makes noise, blinks, and turns it's head.
customer_reviews.author: KKD

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy it.
customer_reviews.text: It's a piece of crap. Kids lost interest after a few minutes.
customer_reviews.author: katie Kyler

customer_reviews.title: Too cute and fun
customer_reviews.text: This little fellow was freaking adorable. I purchased this for a guy in his early 30’s as more of a gag gift and every adult at the party loved it and played with it. It talks and was just too cute. I will be buying these for my great grand children.
customer_reviews.author: Karen H

customer_reviews.title: Best choice!
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old son is obsessed with monkeys so naturally, these were a no brainer especially for the price. I got him 2 different colors and he absolutely adores them. If you're buying for a younger child, just know that they are bigger than they appear and will not fit in their finger. My son carrys his around like a baby.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Yost

customer_reviews.title: 8 yr. old granddaughter loved it .....
customer_reviews.text: There was nothing to dislike about this. Got it for a gift for my 8 year old granddaughter. She added it to her collection of other fingerlings. I guess these are the “in” thing with girls .... and maybe hoys too. It’s cute and it made my granddaughter very happy when she received it as a gift from us.
customer_reviews.author: Not A Lot Of Money "Mom"

customer_reviews.title: 6 year old loved it. She saw these on youtube so I ...
customer_reviews.text: works perfectly, 6 year old loved it. She saw these on youtube so I bought for her birthday. She hasn't stopped playing with them all day
customer_reviews.author: Nikki N

customer_reviews.title: 3 y.o. Loves little friend
customer_reviews.text: Very cute. My 3 year old loves that it comes with a little friend.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 3 of these. 2 for my nieces and one for my son. They all loved them. I’m not really sure what all it does lol but it’s what they wanted and i think they’re adorable. I do know they they fit well on all of their fingers and they’re all different ages.
customer_reviews.author: Darina Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the purple sloth for my Granddaughter and she adores it. This was cheaper than buying local with free prime shipping. This item was as described and arrived on time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old loves it. He takes it everywhere with him. He cuddles it and gives it kisses. He thinks it’s a mommy and a baby monkey.
customer_reviews.author: Danijela

customer_reviews.title: Fun Spin on the Fingerling
customer_reviews.text: Fun revamp of the fingerling. My daughter loves all things matching and small so this was a great gift for her. She loves the little baby or bff. We had the original fingerling so she knew exactly what to do with this one. Fun and cute. Great gift idea for those school parties your children get invited to.
customer_reviews.author: WWeber

customer_reviews.title: Daughter Enjoys
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old daughter asked for a fingerling. Paid $5.99. She seemed to lose interest pretty quickly, so this may be more appropriate for a 4 or 5 year old. Great price. Would be a good gift for young kids.
customer_reviews.author: MLB

customer_reviews.title: A cute interactive toy
customer_reviews.text: This is such a cute toy. The directions are easy to follow for my 3 yr old. It’s interactive and it’s fun. It’s soft and really durable. The batteries last long, had it since Christmas and haven’t changed them once
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: Sweet sound Maker.and cute toy
customer_reviews.text: This little cutie was perfect for my puppy to play with and it makes sounds z it can wrap Arjun’s a child’s finger perfect or an adult . Good entertainment fir all. We lived it.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: LOWEST PRICE I HAD SEEN - SAME ITEM
customer_reviews.text: Around Christmas time Amazon had the best prices on Fingerlings & the gym or monkey bars for them to play on. I purchased this for my 2 year old granddaughter because she loved her 6 year old cousins Fingerlings. Now everyone is happy.
customer_reviews.author: pkeene

customer_reviews.title: Save your box for return Unfortunately I didn’t
customer_reviews.text: It is really cute but the eyes quit opening after 2 days so I wouldn’t buy it again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Adorable toy!
customer_reviews.text: I'm writing this review a year after purchase and I've no complaints. My little girl absolutely adores these things! I would recommend having batteries on hand though, as it will relieve meltdowns when the originals inevitably die. Battery size is CR2025 (they use the button type).
customer_reviews.author: Erin Cohen

customer_reviews.title: Great toy/small gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought for daughter and she loves the set. The bigger one does several different things that make my daughter giggle. It really is a great toy. The small monkey is tiny which my daughter liked a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Wabih

customer_reviews.title: Cute but annoying
customer_reviews.text: It makes some cute sounds but repeats the same annoying one too often!
customer_reviews.author: Baymuse

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Junk! It says the same thing over and over! Very disappointed with this toy!
customer_reviews.author: MustangPatty

customer_reviews.title: I love the color and the mini BFF- SO CUTE
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the cutest fingerlings yet! I love the color and the mini BFF- SO CUTE!
customer_reviews.author: Suzie

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my son's girlfriend, and she loves it! Worked great right out of the box and and it does all kinds of noises. Cute and funny. A+
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Failing

customer_reviews.title: I hate this thing.
customer_reviews.text: It was cute for a few hours then the battery started to die I guess and the thing started to sound demonic. My daughter still plays with it but she misses it talking. I'm sorry I will not buy batteries that have to be replaced once or twice a day. ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Flaming

customer_reviews.title: MY DAUGHTER LOVES IT
customer_reviews.text: Its fun, cute, has several movements and sounds. She loves it. Closes and opens its eyes, moves the head, etc. Lovely gift I think for a wide range of ages, from 5 to 10.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I ordered 2!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one for my grandson who is 1 years old and he loved it so much I had to order another for my nephew who is 3 yrs old. My nephew carries his everywhere with him, it's like a pet to him. Great purchase and price for a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Butterfly

customer_reviews.title: adorable!
customer_reviews.text: my girls loved their new friends and I think they're so adorable ^_^ the little baby that comes with are so cute too. Discovering all the different interactions is very fun for young children.
customer_reviews.author: A. M. S.

customer_reviews.title: Cute, interactive little toy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 2 year old for Christmas and it is one of his favorite things he got. I didn’t expect it to make noises and move but the big one does. The small one doesn’t do anything but they’re both so cute and my son loves them. Great toy for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: Huge hit at the birthday party! Even the parents played with it.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Crownover

customer_reviews.title: Great toy! Quite strange! Kids love it!
customer_reviews.text: She loves it, so I do too. Parent portion: Now it does make little squeaking sound and some nibble sounds during Idle so before you start searching for mic entree points make sure this toy is turned off
customer_reviews.author: Epiphany

customer_reviews.title: PRODUCT DEFECTIVE OR BAD BATTERIES SENT
customer_reviews.text: This Fingerling doesn’t make sounds. Opened as a gift at granddaughters party yesterday
customer_reviews.author: Brenda D

customer_reviews.title: Like a tamagotchi but somehow less entertaining
customer_reviews.text: This is the kind of toy your kid really wants but you know and I know, it’s pretty lame. So while I can’t complain too much (the item looks and works exactly as advertised) this toy is not a prize winner. There’s some head turning, monkey (?) noises, faux snoring, and that’s about it. Comes with a tiny version that adds to the lackluster appeal.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Happy Kid
customer_reviews.text: The little girl on game to smile she loved it she can't put it down that is a good toy when this girl decides to play with that toy as long as she did she doesn't do that but she did with this toy so thank you very very much for having such a great item
customer_reviews.author: Robert  Garcia

customer_reviews.title: SO CUTE
customer_reviews.text: This product is not only cute but my granddaughter loves it. She wants more and her friends all want one. AWESOME

customer_reviews.title: Battery life is horrible!
customer_reviews.text: This monkey only worked for 5 days. Very disappointed as my granddaughter was super excited to get the monkey in her Easter basket.
customer_reviews.author: Trayce C

customer_reviews.title: Great price- less than Target
customer_reviews.text: Way less than at Target, and my daughter loved it. Is exactly the same as the full priced one we bought at Target a month ago
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Bought multiple as gifts. My 8 year old loves them and so did both 5 year olds I purchased them for. They work wonderfully and are super cute.

customer_reviews.title: Grand daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift. Granddaughter is happy. I don't know what is meant by thickness of this toy.

customer_reviews.title: Cute but don't do much
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how much these are supposed to do but it seems as though they just randomly make sounds and turn their heads. No reaction to your voice.

customer_reviews.title: Cute little toy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift-arrived in a timely manner and well-packed-given as a gift and have not received any feedback that it did not function as expected.
customer_reviews.author: filafan

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: It’s great gift for Christmas for many kids. My daughter loves it too much, it’s her pet. I think will be cool to make some pets more for big choice: dogs, cats too.

customer_reviews.title: Cute little toys
customer_reviews.text: It is awesome as far as interactive and entertaining kids.I bought two of them.but one broke in a week.

customer_reviews.title: Bad batteries..
customer_reviews.text: I bought three of these. Two worked fine. One of them completely stopped working after one hour is use. I ended up having to go buy more batteries for it and it still isn’t working right(the eyes aren’t staying open). My daughter is so upset.

customer_reviews.title: Made me an awesome tia!

customer_reviews.title: Fun interactive toy

customer_reviews.text: Its adorable but the larger monkey doesn't seem as nice as the glitter ones. Trying to make all my kids look just as good as eachother. Love fingerlings in general though.

product_meta.title: WowWee Fingerlings Baby Monkey & Mini BFFs - Ashley & Chance (Pink-Turquoise) 3542
product_meta.description: Style:Ashley & ChanceAshley and chance are best friends forever! each fingerlings baby monkey in the BFF series ships with a mini monkey friend that can hang onto their tail or your pencil. Fingerlings are adorable baby animals that are curious about the world around them—starting with you! these interactive pets love to hang onto your finger, blink their eyes, turn their heads, blow kisses, swing by their tails, and talk in monkey babble! these dynamic duos come in a variety of colors - adopt them all and have even more fun monkeying around!
feature_bullets: My name is Ashley and My mini BFF is chance!
Fingerlings baby monkeys respond to sound, motion and touch with blinking eyes, head turns and silly Babble.
Blow them kisses and they'll kiss you back!
Hold them upside down, rock them to sleep or make loud noises to see how they react!
Includes a bonus mystery mini with a rare rating. Collect them all!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars1,625 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
